title: FEMALE PLAYERS
body:
I have not found another girl on this server :(
I would really love to have an all girl ranked team that don't suck like The Sirens.
Not to be sexist because i have played with some great players ALL DUDES.
But would love to know that I'm not the only girl on OCE.
If you are of the female species or know one who loves league and is actually skilled please post on this discussion.

:)

replies.body: Why is gender even relevant, you have to be the type of person who corrects people when they say he instead of she.

LOOK all this started off as me thinking it would be awesome to have an all girls ranked team.
I have never met a girl on here so I was calling out to see if I would get a response from other female summoners.

BLOWN WAY OUT OF PROPORTION lol

> LOOK all this started off as me thinking it would be awesome to have an all girls ranked team.
> I have never met a girl on here so I was calling out to see if I would get a response from other female summoners.
> 
> BLOWN WAY OUT OF PROPORTION lol

Team Siren was a thing, and they dropped the ball hard, most females have enough self-respect to respect the fact that no one cares if they're a girl or boy.

I have guy friends that I rank with. I have self respect however it is still nice to know girls that are into the same thing as you. It is awesome and rare to be able to relate to girls when it comes to gaming.
I'm a girl, we should exchange pics :)
I only have like 3 friends who are girls out of like 100 and something.

lol its a woman that got me into LOL cool chick playing since beta but you don't get to know haha(just think its a little weird "hay some random on the forums told me you a woman" yep that would go down great)

Cool!
Did you think you were the only one too?
You are the first one I have met in OCE.

Hey I know that this thread is from ages ago. But I would love to find some more females that play LoL. I have two female friends already that play league but they are low level and so I am hoping to coach them to become great.
your not alone. but I  often played with my friends.they all guys.
Yeah I get that for sure. Guys generally think girls arent as good at gaming as they are.  So it would be awesome to group together a team of chicks that know the game and love to play.

I know plenty.

Why do you care about gender.
OMG I WANT EXACTLY WHAT YOU WANT! An all girls ranked team! Add meeeee ~ <3
